basics.name: Devi Adi Nufriana
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am Software Engineer with expertise in React and Vue. Passionate about exploring new technologies to optimize feature development for speed and efficiency. Experienced in rebuilding websites using the latest technologies to enhance performance, maintainability, and code readability. Committed to delivering fast, scalable, and high-quality solutions

work.name: Blibli
work.summary: Frontend Engineer leading UI modernization and performance optimization initiatives. Spearheaded migration of legacy systems to Vue.js and implemented comprehensive integration testing.
highlights: Proficiently developed integration tests using Playwright to validate software functionality and reliability.
Took charge of refining the UI Detail page, implementing improvements for an enhanced user experience.
Conducted comprehensive software analysis to identify opportunities for performance enhancement and implemented strategies to optimize system efficiency.
Refactored the review page, hall of fame page, and latest to the latest Vue version, improving performance and reusability by creating modular components
Redesigned and migrated the Review Center page from Java to Vue, enhancing user experience and modernizing the technology stack
Maintained existing features and developed new functionalities based on product manager requests, ensuring smooth and efficient implementation

work.name: Frisidea
work.summary: Full-stack Developer leading modernization of web and mobile applications. Successfully migrated 'Mylife' app to Flutter and implemented modern React practices.
highlights: Upgraded the application to utilize the latest React technology stack.
Took on a pivotal role in enhancing the TMLI web application.
Consistently contributed high-quality code and improvements, ensuring optimal performance.
Translated design concepts into a functional and user-friendly web interface.
Adapted the UI/UX of kitasiap.com to align with user preferences and client expectations.
Leveraged HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create engaging user interactions.
Successfully implemented a web-based customer care access system for the insurance industry.
Ensured seamless user access to policy information and services.
Employed technologies such as JavaScript, ReactJS, ViteJS, Git, Nginx, and Linux to achieve project goals.

work.name: BRI Life
work.summary: Full-stack Developer responsible for modernizing mobile and web applications. Led migration of 'Mylife' app to Flutter and implemented modern React practices.
highlights: Spearheaded the transformation of the 'Mylife' mobile application, transitioning it from React Native to Flutter.
Conducted thorough testing and optimization to enhance user experience and app performance.
Successfully managed three distinct application projects, showcasing adaptability across diverse technologies.
Developed a customer care application, ensuring seamless access to vital services.
Contributed significantly to the maintenance and enhancement of the web application 'Digiform' using ReactJS.
Proficiently utilized a versatile tech stack, including JavaScript, ExpressJS, ReactJS, Git, React Native, SQL Server, and Linux server configuration.
Equipped with the skills to configure and deploy applications in various environments, be it development or production.

projects.name: Sistem Skripsi
projects.description: The thesis process becomes more organized and faster, carried out online and can be accessed anywhere via a browser with the aim of saving time, energy and making it easier to obtain information on the thesis process online.
